text: basa! (He payagambara) tame evum dhairya rakho jevum dhairya him'matavala payagambaro rakhyum ane te'o mate (yatana mate) jaldi na karo, a (loko) je divase te (yatana) ne jo'i lese jenum vacana karavamam avi rahyum che, to (evum lagase ke) divasani eka ksana ja (duniyamam) rahya hata, a che adesa api devum, basa! Avajnakari sivaya ko'i nasta karavamam nahi ave
